name: DeadStop
description:
MAYDAY MAYDAY

THE SHIPS ENGINES HAVE FAILED AND OUR WEAPONS SYSTEMS HAVE SOMEHOW BEEN LINKED WITH THE GYROSCOPIC THRUSTERS... ALL WE CAN DO IS TURN AND SHOOT. OH, AND ASTEROIDS FROM THE LOCAL ASTEROID FIELD ARE GETTING DRAWN INTO THE MAGNETIC FRABRILIZER ON THE SHIP. TO YOUR WEAPONS STATION.

DeadStop is an endless game set upon a marooned space ship in an asteroid field created in around 16 hours of work for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam. 

CONTROLS

LEFT CLICK & RIGHT CLICK - Turn and shoot

MIDDLE CLICK - Use Special Attack

WARNING

Not entirely sure if the game will work in anything but 1920x1080, but you might be lucky if you have to run it in something other then this.
